DOC.detailed_description: The study consist evaluation 4 week exposure study product ; design randomize , double blind , vehicle study effect 1 mg/ml concentration ranpirnase anogenital wart . The dermal reaction score scale describes amount erythema , edema , feature indicative irritation . The clinical response score basis percentage reduction lesion size number .
